tool_description:
Sales forecast for Amazon sellers
Just write the name of the product you want to sell, as your customer usually searches for it. 
Please wait 10 sec: online analysis may take several seconds, typically 5-10 sec.
Please note: this is not an analysis of current competitors' sales, this is a forecast of your sales potential if you want to start selling this product from scratch.
Try to search for a specific product, just as your customers are looking for it, and not a category.
In all Expenses a...
name: Sales forecast for Amazon sellers
title: Sales forecast for Amazon sellers

api_list.name: new

required_parameters.name: request
required_parameters.description: Just write the name of the product you want to sell, as your customer usually searches for it.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: so far only english is available

optional_parameters.name: cost
optional_parameters.description: Specify your SKU cost, including delivery, taxes, and customs payments
